comments.content: Great match 3 game. Colorful, smooth graphics and excellent features.

Fun game...at first. Then there comes a point where you definitely cannot win using logic or strategy. It begins to be pretty random with not enough moves, even using every power up available. I've been stuck on lvl 343 for a while now and that's not fun at all. I love a challenge, but being stuck for days is annoying amd boring. Besides that, there's a lot of clicking to keep playing after each lvl. I counted 8 clicks once. Ugh.

review.content: Thanks for your comment,we appreciate your insights on Candy Smash Mania.Team will optimize these in future.Thank you for your support of the game.Have a good day:)

comments.content: I really enjoyed the twist of having a jigsaw puzzle to solve. The background on the map interesting and are just cutesy enough to be entertaining. The prizes on the wheel while standard have the add bonus of receiving a double bomb upon use of the bomb. So why the low rating? Here's why... Just like every game of this type I have found that it is a complete waste of time to continue playing after a certain level. It becomes ridiculously hard (im saying days and weeks) to pass a level.

review.content: Thanks for your feedback! We deeply respect your advice, and we will try to combine your feedback with our R\u0026D, in order to provide better products. Thanks again for your kindness.
